org.json

Class Decoder<T extends JSONSerializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.json.Decoder<T>

  • public final class Decoder<T extends JSONSerializable>
extends java.lang.Object
    A decoder is used for JSON deserialization. A subclass of type JSONSerializable should be provided as entry point.
    Author:
    Jan-Willem Gmelig Meyling

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Decoder.ParseException
      A ParseException is thrown when an exception occurred during JSON parsing
